transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan
Executive: Haan ji sir IndiaMART office se baat kar rahe the.
Customer: Boliye na.
Executive: Haan ji sir aapne na IndiaMART pe wapas se concern raise kara hua hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aap mujhe bataoge sir aapne bola hua hai ki 400 products add karne ke liye team ko.
Customer: Product add karne ke liye main bola hi nahi main kaun bola product add karne ke liye.
Executive: Yahan par to hai na that he said he wanted to update products his specifications to kindly do the needful mere pass to yahi aaya hai.
Customer: Product ke specs add karna bola product add karna nahi bola tha maine.
Executive: Product ke specs specifications.
Executive: But specification to sir aapko pata hoga na aapke product ka inko kaise pata hoga.
Customer: Main main kya bola tha description jo hota hai na description mein bola tha ek description bana ke deta hu main wo add kar do aur ek image add kar do to image to add karne bole theek hai main karta hu but uske baad to mujhe kuch diya nahi aur mujhe ek bar batao jab million se pehle to mujhe ye sab commitment diya gaya na to mujhe thodi na idea rahega jab commitment diya hai to unko fulfill karna chahiye.
Executive: Nahi aap mujhe ye bataiye lene se pehle aapko ye bola gaya tha ki hum aapke 400 products add karenge.
Customer: Products product add nahi karenge mere bola product add kar denge bole the hum photo add kar denge.
Executive: To sir maximum hum aapke 20 maximum to hum aapke 20 add kar sakte hain remaining jo bhi rahega wo aapko add karne rahenge waha se.
Customer: Nahi nahi dekho main kya bolta fir meri meeting hui thi na to kya bole the unhone ki description aur description to mere ko add karna mujhe malum hai description mujhe malum hai to maine kya bola tha ki theek hai mere product ke images jo hai wo dal do add kar do to bole theek hai but uske baad to mujhe koi fulfillment kuch nahi mila sir uske baad iske liye.
Executive: To aapne unko product ke images share kare the.
Customer: Wo to bole the na ki mere sath mera ek mera ek khud ka banda hai main unko diya hai tum aur wo milke kar do but wo bol rahe sab wahi karega banda karega to wo banda bhi to busy rehta hai na iski wajah se na mam ye to problem hota hai na mera score dam zero hai score matlab 30 40 chal raha hai kuch.
Executive: To sir aap ek bar online aaiye hum online aapko guide kar dete hain na to product kaise aapko.
Customer: Are mere isse pehle bhi online aake gaya ek to sabse bada sabse badi problem to ye hai ki network ka issue itna ganda network ki kya batau main us din meet mein aaya network hi nahi chal raha itna itna kharab kaun sa network hai bhai tumhara network hi nahi chal raha hai itna lag ho raha hai call pe.
Executive: IndiaMART ka network nahi chal raha hai sir.
Customer: Nahi jis jis side maine call pe join kiya tha wo unka itna ganda network ki matlab connect hi nahi ho pa raha hai bar bar meet lift left ho ja rahe bar bar wo chali ja raha hai fir call pe mujhe bata rahe hain mera aadmi join kiya unko call pe bata rahe hain network chali ja raha hai mera aadmi se baat hui.
Executive: Nahi nahi ek kam karte hain na sir video meeting pe main aapko guide kar deti hu network ka to koi issue nahi hai IndiaMART mein ki ha aapka bar bar disconnect.
Customer: Rajat ji kaun hai Rajat ji se baat kar Rajat ji.
Executive: Rajat wahi ki team mein hai sir jo aap se discussion kar rahe hain regarding this to unhone mujhe ye update kara ki aapne unko bola ki aapko 400 products add karne hain karke.
Customer: Are yaar kaise kaise matlab kidhar kidhar kya ja raha hai mujhe khud ko nahi samajh raha hai main bola product to main already add hai product mujhe add karna hi nahi hai abhi main itne product pe kam kar raha hu.
Executive: Aapke total 428 product added hai.
Customer: Almost product hai yes correct.
Executive: Theek hai abhi isme aap bol rahe ho specification aur images add kar rahe hain.
Customer: Specification add nahi description mein bola tha ki main ek description de dunga tumko jaise ki a a matlab VR infotech matlab hum log ye provide karte hain bas wo wo add karne bola tha that's it specification to mujhe malum hai specification add hoga specification to mujhe khud ko add karna padega mujhe idea hai specs ka.
Executive: To aap specification aur description sir jaise hi aap description daloge specification ka tab open ho jata hai to wahi se aap add kariye na kyunki sir dekho idhar se hum kuch galat add kar denge fir uske baad aapka matlab like agar hum aapka add bhi kar dete hain sir to category keyword correction wo sab aapko pata hoga kisne sahi mapping hone wala hai hum karenge kyunki hame aapke product ka knowledge nahi hai hum kuch bhi nahi kar sakte hain aur hamare end se sir disable hota hai itne hum sare add bhi nahi kar payenge aapke description na hum disable ho jate hain waha se hamare liye hum add nahi kar payenge aapke itne to aap ek kam kariye aap mere sath video meeting pe aaiye main sare product jo bhi hai ek ghanta do ghanta jo bhi lagega wo main aapke sath baith ke aapko karwa deti hu koi dikkat nahi hai us cheez mein aapko koi mana nahi karega ki hum nahi karke denge but uske liye aapko thoda sa time dena rahega aur aap karwayenge sir usme hame help.
Customer: Wo mujhe dekhna padega koi nahi main batata hu aapko mere pass abhi wo utna wo nahi hai abhi main main batata hu aapko mujhe kyunki mere pass abhi utna time nahi hai.
Executive: Aapke yahan pe koi account manager hai jo handle kar rahe hain services.
Customer: Yes hai but wo bhi unse to abhi beech mein baat kar tabhi wo leave pe gaye hain to Rajat ji se baat hui Rajat ji bole theek hai ek hafta mujhe time diya ek hafte mein karke dunga zero progress ek hafte mein matlab ek follow up bhi nahi aa raha hai ki follow up to bole ki nahi ho raha hai sir batao to mujhe kuch bhi nahi kuch bhi nahi matlab ye sab cheez ka matlab abhi main kya tumko batau mera score ka score 15% 5% ye sab score hai bataiye ab ye sab cheez jab commitment de rahe hain paisa lene se pehle jab commitment hua tha.
Executive: Scoring ki nahi hai sir dekhiye baat hai ki aapka product ka description and sari cheeze properly waha pe mention honi chahiye wo aapke liye important hota hai samajh rahe ho aap to hame aapka scoring wagera proper theek karwane ke liye na hame aap agar hamare sath ek bar video meeting pe proper baith jaoge na to aapke hi yahan pe benefit ho jayega usme koi problem nahi hai.
Customer: Main isse pehle ek ghanta meeting ko baitha to kya hua mera.
Executive: Main aapko bata deti hu agar aap sat aap saturday free rehte hain sir.
Customer: Mam mera kuch saturday aap thoda sa time agar nikal sakte ho.
Executive: Main aapko commitment deke main free to mera kuch.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir dekhiye main aapko ek bar na saturday follow up kar leti hu khud hi kar leti hu main kisi ko bhi nahi bolungi ki aapko koi follow up kare main khud aapko follow up le leti hu on saturday theek hai saturday ek bar main morning mein aapko 10 baje connect karti hu aap 10 se 11 karna thoda sa hum kuch is saturday karte hain fir next saturday sunday mein karenge teen teen din mein mujhe lagta hai aapke sare product theek ho jayenge usme koi problem nahi hai agar hum ek ek do do ghanta bhi denge to ho jayega aapka kam.
Customer: Dekhna padega theek hai chaliye main batata hu aapko.
Executive: Haan bataiye.
Customer: Main kuch nahi bol sakta bhai mere pass jo tha main.
Executive: Achcha aapko kya karwana hai aap mujhe ye bataiye sir.
Customer: Main aapko jaise aapne ye ek normal product description dal rakha hai our organization AR infotech wala jo pura hai wo aapka sirf product description mein dalna hai sab mein.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Right to most of the product mein to dekhiye aap dekhiye unhone aapka add kar diya hai Rajat ne baat rahi images ki images ki aap mujhe wo dijiye na images jo jo jis jis ka hai uska naam likha hua hai already.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Theek hai aap mujhe images ka pura wo share kar do 1000 by 1000 pixels ke images hoenge aapke pass theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai 1000 wo aap sare images de dijiye mujhe multi angle images ke sath product name ke sath aap sare de do main yahan se add karwa deti hu aapke.
Customer: Mam to images to mere ko dekho images to koi bhi kuch bhi add kar do koi issue nahi hai mujhe images to koi itna wo dekhta nahi mostly name hai dekho maine jo million tha maine main name to dal diya ho so images ka aisa koi wo itna bada wo issue nahi hai mere liye images.
Executive: Sir mujhe images aapke end se chahiye honge main google se mere yahan pe strict orders hai ki main google ya kahin se bhi images aapke product mein ya aapke catalog mein add nahi kar sakti hu wo aapka automatically ban ho jayega fir to main kuch bhi nahi karwa sakti na aise aap mujhe data doge main data upload kara deti hu itna main aapko help kar sakti hu.
Customer: Theek hai mera jo maine account manager ka number diya na unse contact kar lo de dega tumko mere ko bol do.
Executive: Theek hai unse hum baat kar lete hain remaining jo aapne abhi concern raise kara hai wo main close kar du yahan se.
Customer: Kar do fir kuch doubt raha to let's see.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko follow up karti hu sir jo bhi aapne bande ka number diya hai unko bhi hum guide karte hain hum khud bhi aapka help kar dete hain isme koi problem nahi hai.
Customer: Haan kyunki banda matlab koi output nahi dikh raha hai na kuch wo banda chala raha hai do mahine se zero output aa raha hai to fir.
Executive: To sir dekho jisko use karna hai jo aapke yahan pe kam karenge unko thoda acche se aap unko guide karo na ki aap pehle product to theek karo tabhi to aapko orders aana start hoenge aap unko ye cheez to boliye na sir.
Customer: Maine unko ye cheez bol diya hu mam wo abhi aur aap unse follow up lijiye sir.
Customer: Wo to main daily le raha hu main mera follow up chal raha hai mere ko mujhe aisa malum hai ab main last sunday hi meet hui thi tabhi maine bola tha usko ki Rajat Rajat ji koi meet pe aaye the to unke sath ek dedh ghanta meet hui ek dedh ghante mein to mujhe samjha hi nahi kya baat hui unki kya hua dono ka wo bol raha hai kuch nahi sab to fir meeting ke beech mein dedh dedh ghanta ho rahi hai kuch ho nahi ho raha pa raha hai to matlab.
Executive: Theek hai koi baat nahi sir main is cheez mein aapko help kar deti hu hai na.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Haan ji aur main aapko kab connect karu aap mujhe koi convenient time batao us time pe hi baat karke hum aapka product wagera jo bhi rahega us bande ko main aapke jo bhi.
Customer: Haan us bande se hi connect kar lena na aap kal kal connect kar lena na kal.
Executive: Kal main unko connect kar leti hu theek hai.
Customer: Theek theek theek okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants product specifications and images to be added.

- Expresses frustration with network issues during meetings.

- States account manager is on leave.

- Dissatisfied with the lack of progress.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting for guidance.

- Executive will follow up on Saturday.

- Will connect with the customer's contact person.

- Agreed to close the raised concern.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will follow up on Saturday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product specifications, images, follow up, network issues
